Title: 500 - Automated Layout of Trees
Tip: Create a class that 'wraps' a shape to orchestrate the arrangement of horizontal and vertical trees.

Summary.What: Trees are hierarchical arrangements of shapes and very common in diagrams.
Summary.Why: Automated layout is helpful, because tree modifications can impact the entire drawing.
Summary.How: Class FoLayoutTree<Shape2D> uses parent/child relationships to compute the size and location of each branch.
